file.name: advanced_payments.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /v1/advanced_payments:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/marketplace'
      summary: Create Payments
      description: Create Payments.
      deprecated: true
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                payer:
                  type: object
                  description: payer identifier.
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      description: Identification of the associated payer.
                    email:
                      type: string
                      description: Payer’s email address.
                    type:
                      type: string
                      description: >-
                        Type of identification of the associated payer (required
                        if the payer is a customer).
                      enum:
                        - customer -- The payer is a client and belongs to the collector
                        - registered -- The account corresponds to a registered user of Mercado Pago
                    identification:
                      type: object
                      description: Personal identification.
                      properties:
                        type:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification type.
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification number.
                    address:
                      type: object
                      description: Address.
                      properties:
                        zip_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Zip Code.
                        street_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Street name.
                        street_number:
                          type: number
                          description: Number.
                    phone:
                      type: object
                      description: Phone number of the associated payer.
                      properties:
                        area_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Area Code.
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Phone number.
                        extension:
                          type: string
                          description: Phone number extension.
                    first_name:
                      type: string
                      description: Name of the associated payer.
                    last_name:
                      type: string
                      description: Last name od the associated payer.
                payments:
                  type: array
                  description: List of payments made by the buyer.
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        description: Payment identification.
                      status:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment status.
                      status_detail:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment status details.
                      payment_type_id:
                        type: string
                        description: Selected payment method type.
                      payment_method_id:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment method selected to make the payment.
                      token:
                        type: string
                        description: Token card identifier.
                      transaction_amount:
                        type: number
                        description: Product cost.
                      installments:
                        type: number
                        description: Number of installments selected.
                      processing_mode:
                        type: string
                        description: >-
                          Method of processing the payments (aggregator by
                          default).
                        enum:
                          - aggregator -- Processes the payment using the commerce number of Mercado Pago
                          - gateway -- Processes the payment using the commerce number of the Seller
                      issuer_id:
                        type: string
                        description: Identifier of the issuer of the payment method.
                      description:
                        type: string
                        description: Reason for payment.
                      capture:
                        type: boolean
                        description: >-
                          Determines whether the payment should be captured
                          (true, default value) or only reserved (false).
                      external_reference:
                        type: string
                        description: Identifier provided by the seller in their system.
                      statement_descriptor:
                        type: string
                        description: How the payment will appear in the card statement.
                      date_of_expiration:
                        type: string
                        description: >-
                          Expiration date for the case of payment method
                          "ticket".
                      transaction_details:
                        type: object
                        description: Group the transaction details.
                        properties:
                          external_resource_url:
                            type: string
                            description: Identify the resource in the payment processor.
                disbursements:
                  type: array
                  description: List of payments that correspond to each Seller.
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        description: Payment identifier.
                      amount:
                        type: number
                        description: Payment amount.
                      external_reference:
                        type: string
                        description: Identifier provided by the seller in their system.
                      collector_id:
                        type: number
                        description: Seller identifier.
                      application_fee:
                        type: number
                        description: Commission collected by the Marketplace.
                      money_release_days:
                        type: number
                        description: >-
                          Number of days (from the date of approval of the
                          payment) in which the payment will be released to the
                          Seller.
                binary_mode:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    When the payment is activated, it can only be approved or
                    rejected. Otherwise, the payment may be pending.
                metadata:
                  type: object
                  description: >-
                    Valid JSON that can be added to the payment to save
                    additional attributes.
                application_id:
                  type: object
                  description: Marketplace ID.
                additional_info:
                  type: object
                  description: >-
                    Information that can improve the fraud prevention analysis
                    and the conversion rate. Try sending us as much information
                    as possible.
                  properties:
                    ip_address:
                      type: string
                      description: IP from which the request comes (only for bank transfer)
                    items:
                      type: array
                      description: List of items to pay.
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Item code.
                          title:
                            type: string
                            description: Item name.
                          description:
                            type: string
                            description: Item description.
                          picture_url:
                            type: string
                            description: Image URL.
                          category_id:
                            type: string
                            description: Item category.
                          quantity:
                            type: number
                            description: Number of items.
                          unit_price:
                            type: number
                            description: Unit price.
                    payer:
                      type: object
                      description: Buyer’s information.
                      properties:
                        first_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Buyer’s name.
                        last_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Buyer’s last name.
                        phone:
                          type: object
                          description: Buyer’s phone number.
                          properties:
                            area_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Area Code.
                            number:
                              type: string
                              description: Phone number.
                        registration_date:
                          type: string
                          format: date
                          description: Date of registration of the buyer on your website.
                    shipments:
                      type: object
                      description: Shipping information.
                      properties:
                        receiver_address:
                          type: object
                          description: Buyer’s address.
                          properties:
                            zip_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Zip Code.
                            street_name:
                              type: string
                              description: Street name.
                            street_number:
                              type: number
                              description: Number.
                            floor:
                              type: string
                              description: Floor
                            apartment:
                              type: string
                              description: Unit.
      responses:
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400004--Invalid-application-
                      - 400005--The-application-is-required-
                      - 400006--Invalid-date-of-release-for-the-Disbursement-
                      - 400007--Invalid-date-of-release-for-the-Disbursement-
                      - 400013--Invalid-email-address-
                      - 400014--Invalid-number-of-payments-
                      - >-
                        400015--Payer-ID-is-required-for-payments-with-money-in-the-account-
                      - 400016--Invalid-payment-type-
                      - 400017--The-transaction-amount-is-required-
                      - 400018--Invalid-amount-
                      - 400019--The-payment-method-is-required-
                      - 400020--The-payment-type-is-required-
                      - 400021--The-amount-format-is-invalid-
                      - 400022--Invalid-processing-method-
                      - 400023--The-payer-type-is-required-
                      - 400024--The-payer-s-name-is-required-
                      - 400025--The-payer-s-last-name-is-required-
                      - 400026--The-payer-s-identification-type-is-required-
                      - 400027--The-payer-s-identification-number-is-required-
                      - 400028--The-expiration-date-is-required-
                      - 400029--The-payment-token-is-required-
                      - 400030--The-installments-are-required-
                      - 400031--The-amount-of-disbursements-is-required-
                      - 400032--The-collector-ID-is-required-
                      - 400033--Invalid-Marketplace-commission-
                      - 400034--Invalid-disbursement-amount-
                      - 400035--The-field-money-release-date-is-invalid-
                      - >-
                        400036--The-Marketplace-does-not-have-permissions-on-the-payer-
                      - 400037--The-collector-was-not-found-
                      - 400039--Invalid-request-
                      - 400040--Invalid-status-
                      - 400041--Invalid-start-date-
                      - 400042--Invalid-end-date-
                      - 400043--Invalid-email-address-
                      - 400044--Invalid-payer-ID-
                      - 400045--Invalid-collector-ID-
                      - 400046--The-field-external-reference-is-invalid-
                      - 400047--Some-parameters-of-the-search-are-invalid-
                      - 400048--Invalid-ID-
                      - 400049--Invalid-last-modification-date-
                      - 400051--The-field-money-release-date-is-required-
                      - 400052--The-processing-mode-is-required-
                      - 400053--Invalid-content-
                      - >-
                        400054--The-Marketplace-does-not-have-permissions-on-the-collector-
                      - 400055--The-field-external-reference-is-required-
                      - 400056--The-field-money-release-days-is-invalid-
                      - >-
                        400057--The-fields-collector-id-and-external-reference-are-duplicated-
                      - 400058--Invalid-idempodency-key-
        '401':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401000--Invalid-access-token-
                      - 401002--Invalid-access-token-
                      - 401003--Invalid-device-token-
        '404':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 404001--The-Disbursement-was-not-found-
                      - 404002--The-Advanced-Payment-was-not-found-
                      - 404003--The-Payer-was-not-found-
        '406':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 406001--Error-in-the-payments-API-
  /v1/advanced_payments/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/marketplace'
      summary: Get a Payment
      description: Get a Payment
      deprecated: true
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Payment's Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 111111111
                    description: Payment id
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: approved
                    description: Paymentstatus
                  payments:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: number
                          example: 222222222
                          description: Payment id
                        status:
                          type: string
                          example: approved
                          description: Payment status
                        status_detail:
                          type: string
                          example: accredited
                          description: Payment status detail
                        payment_type_id:
                          type: string
                          example: credit_card
                          description: Payment type id
                        payment_method_id:
                          type: string
                          example: visa
                          description: Payment method id
                        token:
                          type: string
                          example: 98f6a9s7dfyihfasfdhasdjfhñasdfh
                          description: Payment token
                        transaction_amount:
                          type: number
                          example: 100
                          description: Payment transaction amount
                        installments:
                          type: number
                          example: 1
                          description: Payment installments
                        processing_mode:
                          type: string
                          example: aggregator
                          description: Payment processing_mode
                        description:
                          type: string
                          example: Payment description
                          description: Payment description
                        capture:
                          type: boolean
                          description: Captured?
                        external_reference:
                          type: string
                          example: ext_ref_payment
                          description: Payment external_reference
                        statement_descriptor:
                          type: string
                          example: MKT-STATEMENT-DESCRIPTION
                          description: Payment statement_descriptor
                    description: Payments
                  disbursements:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: number
                          example: 33333333
                          description: disbursements id
                        amount:
                          type: number
                          example: 40
                          description: disbursements amount
                        external_reference:
                          type: string
                          example: ext_ref_disb_1
                          description: disbursements external_reference
                        collector_id:
                          type: number
                          example: 31313
                          description: disbursements collector_id
                        application_fee:
                          type: number
                          example: 5
                          description: disbursements application_fee
                        money_release_days:
                          type: number
                          example: 10
                          description: disbursements money_release_days
                        additional_info:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            items:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                id:
                                  type: string
                                  example: item-ID-1234
                                  description: id
                                title:
                                  type: string
                                  example: Title of what you are paying for
                                  description: title
                                picture_url:
                                  type: string
                                  example: https://www.mercadopago.com/logomp3.gif
                                  description: picture_url
                                description:
                                  type: string
                                  example: Item description
                                  description: description
                                category_id:
                                  type: string
                                  example: art
                                  description: category_id
                                quantity:
                                  type: number
                                  example: 1
                                  description: quantity
                                unit_price:
                                  type: number
                                  example: 100
                                  description: unit_price
                              description: items
                            shipments:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                receiver_address:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    zip_code:
                                      type: string
                                      example: 5700
                                      description: zip_code
                                    street_name:
                                      type: string
                                      example: Street
                                      description: street_name
                                    street_number:
                                      type: number
                                      example: 123
                                      description: street_number
                                    floor:
                                      type: number
                                      example: 4
                                      description: floor
                                    apartment:
                                      type: string
                                      example: C
                                      description: apartment
                                  description: receiver_address
                              description: shipments
                          description: additional_info
                    description: disbursements
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      email:
                        type: string
                        example: test@user.com
                        description: email
                      first_name:
                        type: string
                        example: Test
                        description: first_name
                      last_name:
                        type: string
                        example: Test
                        description: last_name
                      address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          zip_code:
                            type: string
                            example: 1111
                            description: zip_code
                          street_name:
                            type: string
                            example: Calle
                            description: street_name
                          street_numer:
                            type: string
                            example: 120
                            description: street_numer
                        description: address
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          type:
                            type: string
                            example: DNI
                            description: type
                          number:
                            type: string
                            example: 88999000
                            description: number
                        description: identification
                    description: payer
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: ext_ref_adv_paym
                    description: external_reference
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: Advanced payment description
                    description: description
                  binary_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: binary_mode
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2018-06-27T13:34:20.518Z
                    description: date_created
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: 2018-06-27T13:34:20.518Z
                    description: date_last_updated
                  metadata:
                    type: object
                    description: metadata
                  additional_info:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            example: item-ID-7356
                            description: id
                          title:
                            type: string
                            example: Title of what you are paying for
                            description: title
                          picture_url:
                            type: string
                            example: https://www.mercadopago.com/logomp3.gif
                            description: picture_url
                          description:
                            type: string
                            example: Item description
                            description: description
                          category_id:
                            type: string
                            example: art
                            description: category_id
                          quantity:
                            type: number
                            example: 1
                            description: quantity
                          unit_price:
                            type: number
                            example: 100
                            description: unit_price
                        description: items
                      shipments:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          receiver_address:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              zip_code:
                                type: string
                                example: 5700
                                description: zip_code
                              street_name:
                                type: string
                                example: Street
                                description: street_name
                              street_number:
                                type: number
                                example: 123
                                description: street_number
                              floor:
                                type: number
                                example: 4
                                description: floor
                              apartment:
                                type: string
                                example: C
                                description: apartment
                            description: receiver_address
                        description: shipments
                    description: additional_info
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400004--Invalid-application-
                      - 400005--The-application-is-required-
                      - 400006--Invalid-date-of-release-for-the-Disbursement-
                      - 400007--Invalid-date-of-release-for-the-Disbursement-
                      - 400013--Invalid-email-address-
                      - 400014--Invalid-number-of-payments-
                      - >-
                        400015--Payer-ID-is-required-for-payments-with-money-in-the-account-
                      - 400016--Invalid-payment-type-
                      - 400017--The-transaction-amount-is-required-
                      - 400018--Invalid-amount-
                      - 400019--The-payment-method-is-required-
                      - 400020--The-payment-type-is-required-
                      - 400021--The-amount-format-is-invalid-
                      - 400022--Invalid-processing-method-
                      - 400023--The-payer-type-is-required-
                      - 400024--The-payer-s-name-is-required-
                      - 400025--The-payer-s-last-name-is-required-
                      - 400026--The-payer-s-identification-type-is-required-
                      - 400027--The-payer-s-identification-number-is-required-
                      - 400028--The-expiration-date-is-required-
                      - 400029--The-payment-token-is-required-
                      - 400030--The-installments-are-required-
                      - 400031--The-amount-of-disbursements-is-required-
                      - 400032--The-collector-ID-is-required-
                      - 400033--Invalid-Marketplace-commission-
                      - 400034--Invalid-disbursement-amount-
                      - 400035--The-field-money-release-date-is-invalid-
                      - >-
                        400036--The-Marketplace-does-not-have-permissions-on-the-payer-
                      - 400037--The-collector-was-not-found-
                      - 400039--Invalid-request-
                      - 400040--Invalid-status-
                      - 400041--Invalid-start-date-
                      - 400042--Invalid-end-date-
                      - 400043--Invalid-email-address-
                      - 400044--Invalid-payer-ID-
                      - 400045--Invalid-collector-ID-
                      - 400046--The-field-external-reference-is-invalid-
                      - 400047--Some-parameters-of-the-search-are-invalid-
                      - 400048--Invalid-ID-
                      - 400049--Invalid-last-modification-date-
                      - 400051--The-field-money-release-date-is-required-
                      - 400052--The-processing-mode-is-required-
                      - 400053--Invalid-content-
                      - >-
                        400054--The-Marketplace-does-not-have-permissions-on-the-collector-
                      - 400055--The-field-external-reference-is-required-
                      - 400056--The-field-money-release-days-is-invalid-
                      - >-
                        400057--The-fields-collector-id-and-external-reference-are-duplicated-
                      - 400058--Invalid-idempodency-key-
        '401':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401000--Invalid-access-token-
                      - 401002--Invalid-access-token-
                      - 401003--Invalid-device-token-
        '404':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 404001--The-Disbursement-was-not-found-
                      - 404002--The-Advanced-Payment-was-not-found-
                      - 404003--The-Payer-was-not-found-
        '406':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 406001--Error-in-the-payments-API-
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/marketplace'
      summary: Update a Payment
      description: Update a Payment
      deprecated: true
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Payment's Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                id:
                  type: number
                  description: Advanced Payment Identifier.
                status:
                  type: string
                  description: Advanced Payment status.
                  enum: 
                    - pending -- The user has not finalized the payment process yet.
                    - approved -- The payment was approved and accredited.
                    - rejected -- The payment was rejected. The user could retry the payment.
                    - cancelled -- The payment was canceled by one of the parties or has expired.
                    - refunded -- The payment was returned to the user.
                    - partially_refunded -- Part of the payment was returned to the user.
                    - charged_back -- A chargeback has been made on the buyer's credit card.
      responses:
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400004--Invalid-application-
                      - 400005--The-application-is-required-
                      - 400006--Invalid-date-of-release-for-the-Disbursement-
                      - 400007--Invalid-date-of-release-for-the-Disbursement-
                      - 400013--Invalid-email-address-
                      - 400014--Invalid-number-of-payments-
                      - >-
                        400015--Payer-ID-is-required-for-payments-with-money-in-the-account-
                      - 400016--Invalid-payment-type-
                      - 400017--The-transaction-amount-is-required-
                      - 400018--Invalid-amount-
                      - 400019--The-payment-method-is-required-
                      - 400020--The-payment-type-is-required-
                      - 400021--The-amount-format-is-invalid-
                      - 400022--Invalid-processing-method-
                      - 400023--The-payer-type-is-required-
                      - 400024--The-payer-s-name-is-required-
                      - 400025--The-payer-s-last-name-is-required-
                      - 400026--The-payer-s-identification-type-is-required-
                      - 400027--The-payer-s-identification-number-is-required-
                      - 400028--The-expiration-date-is-required-
                      - 400029--The-payment-token-is-required-
                      - 400030--The-installments-are-required-
                      - 400031--The-amount-of-disbursements-is-required-
                      - 400032--The-collector-ID-is-required-
                      - 400033--Invalid-Marketplace-commission-
                      - 400034--Invalid-disbursement-amount-
                      - 400035--The-field-money-release-date-is-invalid-
                      - >-
                        400036--The-Marketplace-does-not-have-permissions-on-the-payer-
                      - 400037--The-collector-was-not-found-
                      - 400039--Invalid-request-
                      - 400040--Invalid-status-
                      - 400041--Invalid-start-date-
                      - 400042--Invalid-end-date-
                      - 400043--Invalid-email-address-
                      - 400044--Invalid-payer-ID-
                      - 400045--Invalid-collector-ID-
                      - 400046--The-field-external-reference-is-invalid-
                      - 400047--Some-parameters-of-the-search-are-invalid-
                      - 400048--Invalid-ID-
                      - 400049--Invalid-last-modification-date-
                      - 400051--The-field-money-release-date-is-required-
                      - 400052--The-processing-mode-is-required-
                      - 400053--Invalid-content-
                      - >-
                        400054--The-Marketplace-does-not-have-permissions-on-the-collector-
                      - 400055--The-field-external-reference-is-required-
